title: Critique my logo
content:
This is the early sketch of a logo were i'm trying to design the typography myself.  
I'm happy with the '5' but i wonder if the '2' is of the same looks… what do you think ?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [52.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204959/http:/typophile.com/files/52.png) | 30.9 KB |
author: nlx

comments.content: In terms of balance, the 5 is bottom-heavy and the 2 is top-heavy; so, IMHO, I think they work well together, and also make for a distinctive logotype.
